original_text: And shall cause their voice to be heard against thee, and shall cry bitterly, and shall cast up dust upon their heads, they shall wallow themselves in the ashes:
korean_text: 너를 위하여 크게 소리 질러 통곡하고 티끌을 머리에 덮어쓰며 재 가운데에 뒹굴며

sentences.original_text: And shall cause their voice to be heard against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 소리를 너에게 대하여 들리게 하리라

sentences.original_text: and shall cast up dust upon their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 머리 위에 먼지를 던지리라

sentences.original_text: they shall wallow themselves in the ashes
